resources.string: 게임빌의 각종 혜택이 담긴 푸시 및 SMS 알림 동의를 하시겠습니까?
"인증을 받지 않으시면 게임이 실행되지 않습니다. 게임을 종료 하시겠습니까?"
원활한 게임 이용을 위해서 개인정보 수집 및 이용 안내에 동의해 주세요.
"The Market billing service is not available at this time. You can continue to use this app but you won't be able to make purchases."
"This app cannot connect to Market. Your version of Market may be out of date. You can continue to use this app but you won't be able to make purchases."
"Cannot run the program due to bad network connection. Please try again after checking your network settings."
"Cannot run the program. Please try again after checking your network settings"
Modifying program information will result in legal prosecution. Please delete the program and try again.

"Game did not load properly. Please terminate the application and load again. *Please check the following: 1. Properly inserted USIM card 2. Turned OFF [Airplane Mode] 3. The game will not load in [Roaming] status. Please contact GAMEVIL customer contact center if none of the above resolves the problem."
